vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
περιποί-ησις, εως, ἡ,
keeping safe, preservation, [NT+5th c.BC+]
__2 concrete, those who are saved, [NT]
__II gaining possession of, acquisition, [NT+2nd c.AD+]; procuring, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II.2 λαὸς εἰς περιποίησιν, ={λ. περιούσιος}, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: possession, property; sharing in, gaining; saving acquiring
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
possession, property; sharing in, gaining; saving acquiring
a laying up, keeping; an acquiring, or obtaining, acquisition, 1Thess. 5:9; 2Thess. 2:14; a saving, preservation, Heb. 10:39; a peculiar possession, specialty, Eph. 1:14; 1Pet. 2:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: obtención, ganando ; posesión, propiedad ; salvación, preservación
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 維持安全, 保存, 得救 (來 10:39)
2) 產業 (弗 1:14)
3) 獲得
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 维持安全, 保存, 得救 (来 10:39)
2) 产业 (弗 1:14)
3) 获得
